articles.title: Supreme Court shuts down Mexico’s lawsuit against American gunmakers - CNN
articles.description: The Supreme Court on Thursday tossed out a lawsuit from the Mexican government that alleged American gun manufacturers should be held responsible for cartel violence on the Southwest border, a decision that shields the companies from a suit that had claimed b…

articles.title: Israeli military recovers two hostages' bodies in southern Gaza - BBC
articles.description: Israeli Americans Judi Weinstein Haggai, 70, and her husband Gadi, 72, were killed during the 7 October 2023 attacks.
articles.content:
